greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1; thereafter a(n) = exp(1/n) * Sum_{k>=0} (n*k + 1)^n / ((-n)^k * k!).
formula: a(n) = n! * [x^n] exp(x + (1 - exp(n*x)) / n), for n > 0.
mathematica: Table[SeriesCoefficient[1/(1 - x) Sum[(-x/(1 - x))^k/Product[(1 - n j x/(1 - x)), {j, 1, k}], {k, 0, n}], {x, 0, n}], {n, 0, 18}]
Join[{1}, Table[n! SeriesCoefficient[Exp[x + (1 - Exp[n x])/n], {x, 0, n}], {n, 1, 18}]]
Join[{1}, Table[Sum[Binomial[n, k]*n^k*BellB[k, -1/n], {k, 0, n}], {n, 1, 18}]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 18 2020 *)
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 18 2020
